## ğŸ“‹ Checklist

<!-- Check all items before submitting -->

### Before Submitting
- [ ] I have read the [CONTRIBUTING.md](CONTRIBUTING.md) guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] Any dependent changes have been merged and published

### Type of Change
- [ ] ğŸ› Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] âœ¨ New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] ğŸ’¥ Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] ğŸ“š Documentation update
- [ ] ğŸ¨ Code refactoring (no functional changes)
- [ ] âš¡ Performance improvement
- [ ] ğŸ§ª Test addition/modification
- [ ] ğŸ”§ Build/CI changes
- [ ] ğŸ·ï¸ Release preparation

### Target Branch
- [ ] This PR targets the correct branch (`main` for features, `hotfix` for urgent fixes)
